ComicInfo.Summary: When the corporation puts Professor Cyrus' lab under surveillance to locate the military's defense mechanism, they discover more than they could have imagined. The scientist's greatest invention is a fully automated android disguised as his only niece, Blue. Upon learning the truth of her existence, Blue's teenage world unravels. But before she can put back the pieces of her puzzle, the corporation decides that she is the answer they are looking for, and they will stop at nothing to reveal her secrets.
ComicInfo.Title: The Truth Is Not Always The Answer We Seek...
